1.content: Which character(s) undergoes muscle growth?
1.title: Choose Character

11.content: Sweet! Now pick a tale!
11.title: Ben

111.content:
Screams of various kinds are heard throughout the markets of Undertown. Crashing noises and the sound of wood and stone breaking were heard as a tan male clad in luchador makeup rolls into the streets, he looks to where he was flung from before running off. Laughing maniacally laughing, he runs off, yelling, "You're gonna have to do more than that to catch me, bro!!"
At his tail were two well-known heroes. One was revonnahgander referred to as Rook Blonko. The other was Ben Tennyson.
Ben was currently in one of his alien forms, one he called Crashhopper. Rook was not that far behind him trying to aim is Proto tool, now in Blaster mode, directly at Fistrick.
"Geez," Ben said, "Doesn't this guy ever quit!?"
The man, known as Fistrick, turns for a moment to shoot the two in order to distract them.
"I'll Show you quit bro!" he calls out to them. He then takes another split-second to take out a smoke grenade and toss it at his feet. He then ran away to say, "You guys can't keep me from this deal, bro's, this is my biggest break yet!"
However Ben used Crashhopper's incredible leaping strength to jump high above the smoke and aimed directly at Fistrick. The criminal turned as he heard the jump. Aiming his laser, he took a few shots before one actually hit him where the watch faceplate was. Fistrick smiled for a moment admiring the shot, "HAAA! looks like the bro’s taking a fall!"
Ben fell to the ground the, Omnitrix Central on Crashhoppers chest cracked and sparking. As Rook left the smokescreen he saw this and ran to Ben. Rushing to his partner, Rook said, "Ben! Beeeen! Are you unharmed?" Once he was standing over Ben he says that the Omnitrix symbol was cracked.
Suddenly, in a flash green light, Ben had returned to his normal human form. He looked beat, but okay, "I'm fine," he stood up slowly and looked around, "Where's Fistrick."
Rook looked to the crowd, Fistrick had seemed to have gotten away long since gone from the scene. Rook shook his head, saying, "He seems to have gotten away unfortunately. But, we will find him and capture him. ...We should probably do something about that though." He was pointing to the Omnitrix it crackled a bit on his arm.
"Ah geez," Ben said, tapping his watch slightly, when all of a sudden, if stopped crackling. "Okay, that was weird..." Ben said.
Rook had a puzzled look on his face as he saw it stop crackling. "Does the watch normally do that?"
"No... it doesn't." Ben said.
111.title: Story 1

1112.content:
Later at Mr. Smoothie...
Rook watches as Ben downs a smoothie from his favorite smoothie shop, Rook takes a moment to down a drink himself, when Ben asked, "So Rook, any word on Fistrick yet?" as he drank his smoothie.
Rook simply turned to him with a frown, saying, "There is no news of Fistrick at the moment. Most likely he has gone into hiding to let his trail go cold." Rook then sighed taking a sip from his own smoothie.
"Great.. " Ben said, "Now how are we supposed to find-" Suddenly Ben felt odd...
Rook looked at Ben as the pause in his sentence was somewhat alraming, "Why did you pause Ben?" Rook asked, "Is this one of your so called Jokes?"
"No, it's just..." Ben said, "I feel really weird..."
Rook turned to look at Ben and he didnt look very different. He thoought that maybe Ben's shirt looked a bit tighter than usual but he chalked that up to him changing up his style. He asked, "Well, maybe we need to get you checked out? Is it possible you ordered a bad Smoothie?"
Ben then took another lights up from his smoothie then said, "It doesn't seem off to me." Ben smiled, but then that smile was gone as he then wiped his forehead with his arm. Rook took notice of this, Hmm maybe you are hot? you seem very frantic." He gave Ben another look over his seemingly slightly more well built than his usual self.
"Yeah, I do feel a bit warm," Ben said to him.
As Rook continued to examine Ben, he asked, "Hey have you been, how do you say 'hitting the gym'?" punching the air between them as he tried to get his point across.
"Uh, no not really?" Ben asked, confused, "Why?"
"Well, from my talks with Kevin, You seem a bit more, um, Swole?, I have only heard Kevin use that term when working out but I have been noticing it a bit on you," Rook gestured to all of Ben's body, though mainly his arms.
Ben looked down to hos body and was shocked at what he saw, "Whoa!! What the- !?"
Rook raiseds an eyebrow as his companions reaction was a cause for slight alarm, "So you havent been 'Hitting the gym'?" Rook asked, concerned, once more gesturing to Ben's body as the clothes seem tighter than before. A small bit of his middle section showing from the bottom of his shirt, "You do seem quite well built for someone who hasn't been doing so."
"Well, I don't know where all of this extra muscle came from!" Ben said, still shocked at what's going on.
1112.title: Later that day...

choices: Rook tires to fix the watch...
11121.content:
Rook seemed a bit worried now as Ben's body seemed to be growing, the shirts tightness increasing ever more as the cuffs on his sleeves have a small rip at the edges and his chest is a bit bigger than before. "Ben," Rook said, "Is it possible you are somehow... growing? How could this happen?
Rook got up from his seat and closer grabed Ben's smoothie, "Could this be the culprit?"
Ben looked concerned at what was happening, by was slightly deadpan for a second, "I'm not sure a smoothie could do this to me Rook."
Rook looked away from the smoothie cup and saw that Ben's body was actually a bigger than before! His sleeves ripped down the side reaching the shoulder, his chest had pushed out enough causing a tear near his now bigger pecs. His pants rode up a bit too and Rook took a few steps back. "Maybe..." Rook said, "I should call someone to figure out what’s happening cause you really seem to be Growing"
"You're... you're right Rook..." Ben said, flexing a bicep for a second. It was much bigger now, "I'm getting more buff by the second." The small tears around the shirt grew larger, showing his slow growth, bare patches of shirt revealing how well cut he has grown by now. Rook decided he should do something by reaching over to Ben to help him stand up from his chair, which his but was now stuck in (Ben blushed at this self-realization). However, Ben seemed to not be phased by rook's attempt to pull him upwards.
"Well seems your stronger too," Rook said.
"Heh-heh. I guess I am," Ben said, "He then grabbed the side of his seat and pulled himself upwards. He was easily separated from his chair and standing up now.
Rook was now looking UP to be eye to eye with Ben now. He then saw him, his full body, his shirt near tatters over his body as well as his pants looking more like tattered shorts. "Whoa," Rook went, "Okaaay... let's go before you grow too big to be a little modest."
"Um yeah I should-" As Ben was about to reach the top of his hand he saw that his Omnitrix was a bit off. The parts that were green were now, instead, a multitude of colors, even white. The black faceplate itself was now a shade of cyan. (somewhere between blue and green) "I think I found the problem, Rook," Ben said.
"Hm?" Rook leaned over noticing that he was messing with the watch, and the lights beaming off of it were different than usual, "The Omnitrix? ... Now that you mention it, Fistrick did shoot it but why is it causing you to grow?"
He gestured to Ben upon saying that last word as he continued to grow a bit buffer and buffer. His shirt was now in tatters on the floor and his pants were now even tighter, taut across his waistline region, showing off his thick legs and calves. "You got me there," Ben said, now smiling a weakly.
As Ben keeps growing still, Rook leads him to a nearby alleyway, "Here," he said, "We should get you out of sight before you scare the locals." The two try to slink in being a bit successful after a momentary struggle, as Ben's increasing size became problematic. "So, Think you can turn it off, Ben? Or maybe you know to fix it?"
"I'm not sure," Ben said, "I don't know how to watch could be doing this to me, even as a malfunction."
Rook pondered solemnly. The space in the alleyway getting a bit thinner due to Ben's growing size. Now in thought, Ben leaned against one of the walls behind him and in a few seconds, he actually crashed through it into a nearby warehouse. Luckily the place was empty save for a few freight crates. Rook immediately rushed to him, saying, "Ben are you alright?"
"Yeah," Ben said, "I'm fine." The still growing Ben stood up.
Rook now looked up at the growing Ben, his pec's a giant shelf of muscle. The sound of ripping was heard between the two as the last of Bens pants got ripped from the fall, leaving him in ultra-tight boxers.
"Well at least we can hide in here," Rook told his giant friend, "Although, I don't think the owner is gonna be too happy about the property damage"
Rook walked by Ben, trying to think up a solution to this problem. He turned, still able to see Ben grow, fiddling with his watch as the lights changed frantically.
11121.title: Ben keeps growing

111212.content:
"Hmm, here, let me see if I can figure it out, Ben," he says reaching up at Ben. Ben then leaned down Rook can reach the Omnitrix more easily. The revonnahgander then begin to fit with the device. However after a few seconds a small beam shot out and hit Rook, zapping him slightly. "Ow!" He yelled, the beam didn't knock him back, but it did sting greatly even if for just a single split second.
"Rook!" Ben said shocked, "Are you okay?
-Soon a strange sensation begins to fill Rook's being, feeling a bit woozy and wobbly before that subsided, "Uh... I do not feel so hot..." He then looked at Ben, the said, "I'm fine. That was just that was a powerful shock..." He faced Ben who grew had grown bit more, Rook was now only at the top of his abs now in terms of height, the two stared for a moment before walking deeper into the warehouse.
After a minute or two, they were at the corner of the warehouse. "Okay," Ben said, "we need to stop this before-" Ben stopped music sentence as he looked at the watch. The glowing, multicolored parts were once again green. Even though the normally black faceplate was still cyan he checked himself still. "Hey! I think I've stopped growing!"
Rook smiled, "Oh that's a relief... although are you stuck like that?" He pointed to Ben's entire body as if gesturing towards his frame.
Ben thought of it for a moment, then said, "I'm not sure, I guess I am..." Ben was now bigger, around 10 feet or so, as Rook was now looking directly at the middle of his abs, which were now an incredible ten-pack!
Rook looked at his communicator then back to Ben, his body massive and rippling with a multitude of muscles. "Hmm I guess you way beyond what Kevin would define as swole," Rook touched Ben's arm inspecting its rippling features and his physique.
"Hahaha," Ben went, "I guess so!" Ben then flexed his arms in a double bicep pose.
Rook took a moment to pout about what he saw, "Ben you are not... enjoying this are you?" he asked as he watched Ben flex his newly gained muscles.
"A little bit," Ben said, now bouncing his pecs.
Rook flexed with Ben for a moment before the sound of a car pull up followed by a few footsteps. A few men in hazmat suits entered the warehouse to see the two muscle behemoths standing before them. Rook awkwardly waved at them, "Hello gentlemen."
111212.title: Rook tires to fix the watch...

choices: The two then hung out around Undertown
The two learn Fistrick has been spotted.
1112121.content:
Later on, the two were at the main Plumbers HQ. They were in the medical bay being examined via CT Scanners. Eventually, a doctor said, "Okay, you too can stand up now."
Rook then stood up from the machine towering over the doctor "Sooo any news doctor?" he asked, trying to move as little as possible.
"Hm, I'm not sure," the doctor said, looking at the results on his clipboard, "It seems like your DNA was altered somehow, strengthened in fact."
"Well," Ben said, flexing his arms forward, "You're right about the 'strengthened' part!
Rook smirked at Ben flexing, "Is this reversible doctor? As well as any future detriment?" he asked the doctor gently reaching at him.
"I'm not sure," the Doctor told him, "I've never seen such complex DNA modification before..."
Rook took a moment to ponder the situation then told the doctor, "So what should we do? This is unnatural, so should we worry?"
"Worry?" Ben asked, "I feel great."
"I may have to agree with Tennyson," The doctor replied, "As far as I'm aware, you are both very healthy young men, according to these reports."
Rook smiles letting out a sigh of relief, "Well at least that is good news," he said, "What should we do now? Are we cleared to go?"
"For now yes."
And with that, the two stepped out of the room.
1112121.title: Later, at Plumber HQ...

choices: Fisktrick was long gone when the two heroes got there
They arrived just as Fistrick was leaving
11121212.content:
Rook bowed to the doctor as the two took their leave. Plumbers at the HQ gave them soome serious glances, some surprised, others intrigued, but most of it was shock. Rook waves to most of the people they pass by. Ben however, was more direct saying hi, flexing and posing for people, being a bit arrogant as usual. Rook turned to Ben, saying, "Can you be anymore showboaty Ben?"
"I'm surprised you know what showboaty means, Rook?" Ben said, smiling.
Rook frowned for a moment, saying, "Knowing well its a word alot of people give you so I decided to look it up. And yeah, it matches."
Suddenly their badges rang off, Rook overhears the call and the two turn to eachother. Rook said, "Another shot at Fistrick, you ready?"
"Are you kidding?" Ben said to him confidently. Then, bouncing his pecs he added, "He wont know what hit him!"
Rook smiled, doing a confident pose with his chest, "You are right Ben and we will hit him real hard!"
11121212.title: The two learn Fistrick has been spotted.

111212121.content:
Fistrick was currently at this bar, back in Undertown, at one of it's more dangerous areas. He was chatting with this man at a corner, the man handing him some money.
Suddenly the ground vibrated a bit from the weight of two heavy footsteps. Rook entered the bar having to hunch over and slide through the door, still clad in nothing more than tight part of underwear as he took a look around the bar and saw Fistrick. Rook whispered into a new communicator he got for himself, then slowly walked up behind Fistrick casting a shadow over him and the patron he was talking to, his new muscles in full display. "Fistrick, You should surrender now before he gets here," Rook said.
Suddenly another, large figure hunched over the doors enters the bar. This was the now giant Ben Tennyson, "Too late for that." Ben was also still wearing nothing more than a tight pair of underwear. Fistrick became aggrivated, but then immideately shoeckd. Rook gabbed his shoulder and lifted him up easily to look him in the eye. Rook said, "Fistrick, you are officially underarrest for the selling of illegal alien technology," Rook had a cocky smile on his face, "Come quietly and we dont have to use these." He flexed his free arm to emphasize his muscles.
"Your choice dude," Ben said, arms at his sides and bouncing his pecs, "Your choice..."
Fistrick grunted throwing a punch at Rooks arm, the blow not only unfazed Rook but he ended up hurting his fist upon impact howling in pain. Rook frowned for a moment, "Wow that really did you no good. This is, how you earthlings say 'Shooting your feet'?"
"I think you mean 'shooting yourself in the foot,' Rook," Ben said, readying his fist... BAM! Fistrick was out cold.
Rook then threw Fistrick's unconcious body over his shoulder and turned to Ben. "Huh, and I wanted to get a good hit in as well too," he said, sounding slightly disappointed as he began to turn to leave the bar, "No worries citizens of Underwood, you may return to your meals and drinks." Rook then ducked to fit through the door again and leave. Ben followed suit, looking at the Omnitrix smiling at what happened.
111212121.title: Fisktrick was still there

choices: Ben decides to cheer up Kevin
1112121211.content:
Later on, Plumber officers arrived to take Fistrick away. Among them was Kevin who was completely shocked at what he saw when he looked at Ben and Rook. Ben simply said, "So... 'sup?" he and Rook smiling at their osmosian friend.
"Greetings Kevin," Rook said, "How do you like the new look?"
Kevin stood a bit surprised before asking, "How... how did... Why are you guys so Muscular?"
"Oh your better off asking Ben," Rook said, "But from what we have gathered a malfunction in the watch seems to have strengthened us."
"Yeah!" Ben said, flexing an arm, "It's sweet."
Kevin stared at them for a moment letting out a disgruntled sigh before holding his head he asked them, "Wait, a glitch with the watch? Tell me you have that thing under control."
"Well, for the most part, yes we do," Rook replied, reassuringly, "Although, we don't know too much about what happened." Rook then folded his arms making his pecs bounce a bit. "It is nice though," he added, with Ben smirking at that remark.
Kevin looked at Rook, silently seething as he watched him easily bounce those pecs. The two have muscles he could only dream of and he would love to be in their shoes right now... He then said, "Maybe you should get some help guys? I mean, this may seem cool, but you may need a hand if this gets worse."
"Actually, Rook said, "I thought that too, but the Doctors back at HQ said we are perfectly healthy. I am thankful, knowing that this isn't as big of an issue." He then flexed both of his biceps, making Kevin seethe were he stood, it's as if he was showing off to him and it was irking him for not being there when it happened...
"What's the matter, Kev?" Ben asked, "Jealous?" He then flexed in a side-chest pose, making his pecs bounce forcefully.
Kevin seethed, letting out a gruff "Its nothing," as he looked away, then looked back at Ben flexing before him. He started to mutter under his breath for a moment before asking, "Are you guys absolutely sure you're fine? I don't wanna see you freak out."
"Honestly?" Rook said, "I am not completely sure, but we feel fine and we are healthy so there's that. Plus the muscles are a nice added bonus." He then flexed, showing off unintentionally and Kevin muttered under his breath, "Yeah I bet they are a nice added bonus..." with a low growl to his tone.
1112121211.title: They Run into Kevin

11121212111.content:
Ben, concerned looked at the other Plumbers and said, "Guys, it's okay, you can go on ahead, Kevin can stay here with us."
The other Plumbers left with Fistrick, taking him away. Ben then looked at Kevin and asked, "You wanna hang out?"
Kevin looked up curious at what Ben could mean, but if there was a possibility he could get those massive rippling muscles himself, then he was in. So, he nodded and watched as the other Plumbers leave the area. He turned to Ben and asked, eyebrow raised, "So, what are you planning Ben?"
"I concur, Ben, why would you suddenly invite Kevin to hang with us? Not that I mind of course," Rook chimed in, just as curious.
11121212111.title: Ben decides to cheer up Kevin

11122.content: "Ben you should go home for the rest of the day." Said Rooke. "Yeah good idea" Ben said as he stood up. Once Ben got home a bright smile radiated off his face. He ran into his room took of his jacket and put on a tight white shirt. "I look even bigger now" Ben said to himself. Flexing his small biceps in the window. "Ben 10 the muscle man" Ben thought to himself. Ben looks at himself up and down several times. He looks at his watch. He begins messing around with it. Maybe I should
11122.title: Ben stops growing. For now...

12.content: Sweet! Now please pick a path!
12.title: Kevin Levin

121.content:
Kevin walked into the abandoned laboratory, fifty feet beneath the ground. He had been sent there to investigate for the plumbers. "Ok, this should be easy enough," He said, all he needed was evidence of work there. He looked around, seeing nothing but old equipment.

After about a total of one hour. He finally found some vials. He looked at the liquids, making sure he didn't drop anything. He smiled as he grabbed a vial only for it slipped from his hand and fall. When it hit the ground, it broke and splashed all over Kevin. "Oh great..." He said annoyed. Suddenly, he felt a sting as his body grew hot...
121.title: Story 1

1211.content: He felt his chest begin to warm up as he grew curious what was in the vile? "What was in that stuff?" He murmured to himself. He picked his plumber badge to radio for a pickup. "Hey Kevin here I need a pick up at sector 4..." But before he could finish his sentence he dropped his badge as a massive wave of pleasure hit him. He dropped to his knees not being able to withstand what he felt. Next thing he remembered was his chest warming up so bad it felt like there was lava underneath his skin. Then out of no where his shirt popped and 2 muscular pecs popped up. "Strange" Said Kevin as his badge rang. "Ben here Kevin I'm on my way to pick you up do you need an medical assistance?" Asked ben. "No" But before he could finish he dropped his badge as his biceps grew. Again a massive wave of pleasure hit him. He moaned as his pants began to rise up a little. "This feels so good!" Kevin began to moan. Kevin slammed his fist against the floor shattering the cement and his badge. He stood up as his legs began to grow with muscles. "OH GOD" He yelled as his shirt ripped all the way exposing his stomach. Abs began to grow in as he moaned louder. "Hello?!" Kevin heard in the distance as he looked he saw Ben standing there with a horrified look on his face. "Kevin what happen!"
1211.title: He suddenly began to grow

1212.content:
"Ah crud, I feel hot!" Kevin said, almost yelled, as he took off his shirt in an attempt to stave off the unnatural heat now racing through him. He then found a restroom door and proceeded through it. Going up to the sinks, he turned one on and repeatedly splashed himself with small bits of water repeatedly. After a few seconds, he began to feel more normal again. "Geez," the plumber said, "what was that??" After a few seconds, he put his shirt back on and proceeded to leave the area.

A minute later and he was back in his car, and left the area. He then took out his Plumber's badge and spoke to its built-in intercom, "This is Kevin Levin, Plumber Badge 371-B, do you copy?"
A voice came out from the Badge, "We copy Unit 371-B. Kevin Levin, what's your position?"
"I just left the abandoned base," the Osmosian replied, "The intel was right, there was a lot of stuff there, couldn't all be legal. I did a mandatory sweep, you guys are clear to send a forensic team in there."
"We copy. We'll send a team right away."
Kevin was about to reply when suddenly, he began to feel strange...
1212.title: The heat wore off

12121.content:
"Everything ok there Unit?" the voice asked.
"Um yeah..." Kevin said, feeling warm. Not unbearably hot like earlier, but just warmer. Kevin soon felt sweat drip from his forehead. His body was actually slowly swelling a bit. Literally, his muscles were slowly growing to his surprise. "What the-?!" He felt his clothes tightening.
"Unit, did something just happen?" the Plumber on the call asked.
"No, everything's ok!" Kevin said nervous, his clothes began to feel even tigher...
"... Alright unit," the Plumber said, "Please advise the situation. What did you find there?"
"I found some vials. About five, only three were filled" He said as best as he could without sounding nervous. Suddenly his toes began to pop out of his shoes.
"Anything else?" The plumber asked.
"There were a few paper files..." Kevin almost grunted for a sec there, "lying around as well. I saw notes about many kinds of elixirs. From growth, to... health, to transformation" he finished, panting a bit. His clothes kept getting a bit tighter as his sleeves began to rip along the biceps and forearms.
"Anything else of interest in those files?" the Plumber asked.
"Just about the ingredients..." He groaned softly. "I did notice that they were trying to make an alien but they..." he let out a slightly loud pant, "Failed." He finished, he felt his shoes being torn off his feet as his shirt ripped at the shoulders, and slowly began to tear across the chest area.
"Were there signs of anyone else there after the lab was abandoned, but before you entered?" the voice asked.
"No, it was all empty." He said, he groaned a bit as his pants ripped at the bottom. His calves getting bigger as his sleeves were now gone from his arms.
"I think you may have misheard he agent," the Plumber said, "Were there signs that some else broke in?"
"No. There wasn't, it all looked good" He groaned. His pants tore a bit more as his shirt got tighter. He groaned a bit, loving the feeling as his shirt ripped further down his shirt.
"Understood, what's your ETA to the nearest Plumber station?" The voice asked, seemingly convinved that all was well.
"About... Five to ten minutes" He said, he could barely think straight. He was loving it too much. His pants ripped more and soon he was left shirtless.
"One more question," the voice said, "Was there any sign of radioactive activity?" Indeed Kevin had a geiger counter bought with him just in case.
"No, it was all clear sir," He said, his pants were now shorts as he smiled from the feeling. He didn't want it to stop.
"Alright, HQ Out," the line then went dead.
12121.title: The Car Ride...

121211.content:
Within a few seconds, Kevin's pants had burst off completely, leaving him in his briefs. "Finally!" He exclaimed happily.
He sweated more as he grunted. Veins and muscles popping and pumping. He felt his briefs getting tighter but didn't care. The feeling was too glorious.
"Oh..." he said, almost moaned, "this feels so... so..." Suddenly, he felt his head brush against the ceiling of his car, partially snapping him back to reality. "Oh crap!" He shouted and parked at the side of the road, almose going back to his trance as he kept growing.
His head wasn't completely clear but he still knew that he had to call someone and warn them what was happening...
He took his badge and thought about calling the plumbers but he'd get in trouble for lying. "I can't believe this..." He said and called Ben. It took a few seconds, but eventually Ben answered the call.
"Kevin? What's up? Why did you call me?" He asked, "Weren't you investigating an old lab out of town?"
"Y-yeah. But I need your help. I accidentally broke something, getting the liquids on me" he said, panting and groaning as he grew.
"You sound... off, are you okay?" Ben asked, concern in is voice.
"I just need you to come to my location, quick" He said panting, his briefs ripping at the sides.
"Kevin...?" was Ben's responce.
"Please...." He grunted, desperate
"... ...Okay, I'll be right over there," Ben said.
"Ben... thank you," Kevin's underwear kept ripping as he kept ripping, "And Ben, find the biggest clothes you can find..."
"Uh... Right..." Ben said, confused, then hanging up.
121211.title: The Growth Continued

1212111.content:
Kevin sighed in relief, soon his underwear ripped and he was left naked. He blushes and used a ripped up piece of cloth to cover himself. This barely worked though, as he still had to cover it with at least one hand. He had then run to the bushes, right next to his car.
Eventually, Ben had arrived at the spot. He was holding a bag with clothes as big as he could find on such short notice. "Kevin?" he said, seeing the empty car, "You there?"
"Over here, Ben."
Ben then spotted Kevin next to the car. When he saw his now larger friend, his jaw fell from shock. "Whoa! Kevin, wh- ?! What happened!? You're huge!"
"I accidentally spilled something on me, and... I kinda lied to the Plumbers about it. You gotta help" He said, taking the clothes and putting them on. They could BARELY fit him. The T-Shirt and shorts were skin tight. The shirt could only cover the upper half off his body with the sleeves only covering his shoulders, and the shorts only went up to mid-thigh.
"Um... Okay," Ben said, first we gotta hide you.
"This is insane! My car is too small and these clothes are too tight on me now!" he said.
"Sorry," Ben said, "Those were the biggest I could find!"
"You gotta hide me...!" He said, half moaning as he felt the new clothes tighten...
"Kevin?" Ben said, noticing something, "Are you... ? Are you still growing!?"
"I... am...! Ben, you gotta do something!" He exclaimed, growing and grunting... "Woah!" He said almost falling back but catching himself, "Just bring stuff to me."
"Stuff?" Ben asked, confused.
"Go to the labs and find things to help."
"Okay... I'll be right back," Ben then went to his car and drove into a location Kevin told him about.
1212111.title: Ben arrived with clothes

choices: He began to grow slowly, like Kevin
12121111.content:
Ben had arrived at the underground labs that Kevin was at. "Okay, somewhere is the key to helping Kevin." He then began to look for any sign for a potential cure.
Ben had begun to rummage through the files on one of the work tables when suddenly he knocked over one of the containers. He caught it, but some of the liquid splashed over Ben, who didn't know that it was the same as the chemical that affected Kevin...
"Ah geez," Ben said, as he wiped off his shirt, not knowing what would happen later on. Then he kept looking around. Ironically he didn't get really hot as Kevin did. He began to browse the files left behind. There were some research notes there as well. Ben kept reading until he saw a reference to some kind of cure. This would be a reversal serum that would change a test subject back in the event that their transformation would be out of hand.
Hopeful, he then began to browse the files for a full document that fully explained how to make this cure. However later in the search, he began to feel strange...
12121111.title: Ben Enters the Lab

121211111.content:
Ben looked around, he didn't know what the feeling was. "What's going on?" He asks himself before he looked at the papers. He then noticed that his muscles started to slowly grow. He fell back in shock and watched his body. Frantic, he kept looking around for a document to make the proper antidote more desperately now, even if he felt his clothes getting tighter. "It's happening to me now," he said, "I need to hurry before this gets out of hand!"
After a few minutes, Ben managed to find what he needed. Yet he had a small problem, his clothes were starting to rip. His muscles had grown. His calves as hard as steel and his pecs as big as two footballs. "Oh man..." Ben said to himself panting slightly, "This is getting out of hand." He then took the omnitrix, and set it to contact mode, using it to call Kevin as if it were a cellphone. As he waited for the call to go through, he saw that his feet were bursting out of his shoes. "Come on Kevin, pick up" he said in a whine as he grew. His sleeves ripped a bit as his pants started getting small for him.
121211111.title: He began to grow slowly, like Kevin

1212111111.content:
A voice rang through the Omnitrix, "Tennyson," it was Kevin, "I finally stopped growing, please tell me you have something!" His tone wasn't as full of panic now, in fact, he sounded a bit annoyed.
"I do but we got... a problem," Ben said, grunting a bit. His sleeves soon tore off completely and his pants ripped a bit.
"... Ben," Kevin's voice said, worried, "Did... you get that stuff on you too?"
"It was an accident," he said groaning again. "Not only that but there aren't any materials here" He added with a pant, his chest ripping through his shirt a bit.
"Aw great!" Kevin said, "Are you SURE there is nothing there!?"
"There's some but enough. We're missing a few ingredients" he said and groaned. His pants tore more as he grew taller and gained more muscles. His shirt ripped a bot more and was now completely gone.
"Okay well grab as much as you can!" Kevin said, "I don't want to get in trouble with the higher-ups just 'cause I didn't report something in!"
"Don't worry, Kev! I'll figure... it out!" He said as he grew a bit more. He started loving the sensation of it.
"... ... It's intense isn't it?" Kevin asked in a knowing tone of voice.
"Yep, it really is," He said as he smiled, drooling a bit.
"Okay... maybe I should come over and help. Sound like-"
"No no! It's okay... !" He said with a soft moan.
"Are you sure?" Kevin asked.
"Yeah," He said, his shirt ripping a lot more. It was almost fully gone
"Okay are you grabbing the stuff," Kevin asked, concern in his voice.
"Yeah, I'm getting them," He said, his pants ripping into shorts.
"Okay, is there anything that I might have missed, Tennyson?" Kevin asked.
"Nope. Nothing else," Ben said, his shirt kept ripping. Then it was gone.
"Okay, good- Wait, I'm getting a call from Rook," Kevin said.
"Alright, tell him to help out," Ben said as his pants were soon close to ripping.
"Wait, what?" Kevin asked, shocked.
"We'll need him to... get the rest of the ingredients," he said, grunting a bit as he was soon left in briefs.
"... Okay, I'll let him know, but I have to tell you something," Kevin said.
"What is it?" Ben asked
1212111111.title: Kevin Picks Up

13.content: Very well then. Please select one of five stories.
13.title: Rook Blonko

choices: Canisters filled with an unknown liquid
Containers filled with an unknown powder
131.content:
(Co-Written with FluffyOtters)

Rook looked at the map. "We go straight and to the left and we will be in the designated star system," he told Ben. "There have been reports of strange events there that the plumbers should look into."
Ben nodded, happily sipping into his smoothie. "Well, whatever is going on there will handle it easily," he said.
"Yes. That is what you said the last time," Rook said. "Though you also almost got us captured and nearly eaten and I had to save us, again. You really need to be more observant, Ben."
Eventually, the two landed on the planet. It was sunset, the sky was similar to that on Earth, only the grass was a mixture of purple, violet, and indigo in color. "Where...is everyone?" Rook asked Ben looking around. "It seems very strange that no one is around and yet we got called here."
"Where is everyone?" Rook asked Ben. Ben was slightly suspicious, considering that the info on the most recent theft was handed to them via an anonymous tip. Suddenly the two noticed a suspicious looking hover car, speeding into the distance.
Ben looked at Rook and said, "What do you want to bet that car leads to the guys were looking for?"
"I would say there is a pretty good chance it is as well as the possibility of being a trap. Either way, I know you are going to check it out so let us do this Ben. Someone has to save you after all," he grinned teasing.
Ben smiled back, with that, the two partners began tailing the truck. Eventually, the truck led to an old Warehouse building. "Okay, we have to be careful," Rook said. "No running recklessly into danger like last time. Just nice and slowly..." he crept forward alert for any traps.
"Got it," Ben said to his friend and partner. He reached for the Omnitrix on his arm and selected an alien. A few seconds later, he was transformed into an alien form seemingly best suited for the job: Big Chill. He smirked at the successful transformation (he has worse luck) and fluttered behind Rook heading inside.
The duo went down a few narrow corridors with, Rook waiting occasionally as Ben scouted ahead with his powers until eventually, the two made it into a large open area. There was a small group of men, gathered around a small table, more like a desk. One of them places a huge suitcase on it. Ben and Rook looked to one another as they saw one of the guys open the case.

It contained...
131.title: Story 1

1311.content:
The containers had some unknown liquid but it probably was dangerous because when was it ever not when it’s in a secret meeting in tall containers and a suspicious murky color? “That can’t be good,” he told Rook.
"No, it does not," Rook whispered back. The guys around the tables spoke in an alien language and then another. Another one took out the containers and placed them on the table. After a few rounds of unknown dialogue, they all laughed. "Definitely not good."
“Stop right there,” Ben said rushing in. “Your deal is off and you can come quietly.” He looked fiercely at them and blew a ballast of cold air freezing their hands from moving. One of them, however, was still holding a canister. That man pressed the button on the very top, and suddenly, the odd liquid became gas which quickly spread around the room.
Ben shook his head. “Oh no you don’t!” he said jumping into the air and fluttering his wings trying to redirect the flow. He then taking took a breath, he blasted his ice breath and froze the gas into solid blocks, “That puts your plan on ice!”
Rook, however, was not so lucky, as he was apprehending another one of the thugs, also holding a briefcase. "Freeze," Rook yelled, converting his Proto-Tool into a blaster. The thug slid over to him and activated a second canister, his one he placed directly in front of Rook. Instinctively, Rook caught it but ended up getting a large puff of the mist sprayed at his face.
“Rook are you alright?!” Called Ben hearing the hiss of a canister. He turned around blew a blast of icy wind breath catching that thug and hurriedly flew over to Rook. “What’s happening?” He asked worked.
Rook coughed for a bit, before it stopped, "I... I don't know. I'm fine now." He then looked behind Ben and suddenly said, "Ben, look!" He pointed at the direction to reveal that one last thug was holding a second briefcase, and he was running away.
Ben nodded and swooped after him. He whooshed catching the guy and grabbed the case. “Who paid you?” He asked sounding menacing. The guy looked intimidated, but he then shook his head in fear.
Ben stares at him menacingly before the watch beeped and he turned back into human Ben. “Ah dang it!" He said, "At least we caught them. Anyways, what's in those canisters and what's this all about?"
Back at the ship, the guy was being held inside while Rook and Ben were checking on something outside. Suddenly Rook felt strange and queasy. He hiccuped and almost felt like he had to throw up. “I...I feel weird and don’t feel so good,” he said.

The guy simply shook his head again saying, "I have the right to remain silent!"
Rook leaned forward. “Not here you don’t. You are going to tell us who called us here, who is paying you, and what the purpose of these containers is.” He said commandingly
The guy simply looked down, "You'll find out in a few minutes anyway."
"What do you mean?" Ben asked aggressively.
The man, however, silent once more.
“What do you mean?!” Rook said shaking the guy but he just smirked and said nothing. It worried them what this was.
"Forget it, Rook," Ben said, beat, "This guy's not gonna talk, let's just bring him in."
“Okay,” Rook said bringing the guy and the other thugs back to the ship.

Back at the ship, the guy was being held inside while Rook and Ben were checking on something outside. Suddenly Rook felt strange and queasy. He hiccuped and almost felt like he had to throw up. “I...I feel weird and don’t feel so good,” he said.
1311.title: Canisters filled with an unknown liquid

info.brief_description: It is what it is. A muscle growth story revolving around the guys of Ben 10 Omniverse.
info.description:
This is basically a Muscle Growth story. But with a few rules:

- The character that will grow MUST be male. NO EXCEPTIONS!!
- If nudity must be described, please leave it simple and with as little direct mention of the genital area as possible.
- I'll be watching... ... ...
